attributes.action: stop disabled drivers from parking on double yellow lines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Double yellow lines at the side of roads are there for a reason. To park on them flouts common sense as well as the law. I witnessed an accident which would have been prevented if the disabled driver had not left her vehicle causing an obstruction.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
